column5:
Hi I need help on splake fishing at bancroft does anyone know which lake in Bancroft have splake lolz I really want to catch one.
I was going to try Albion and Riddell lake does anyone know if they have any splake and what bait do you use to catch them can you catch them at the shoreline?? thanks
what is splake never heard of it?
I think its a cross breed between a lake trout and a brook trout if I am not mistaken
learn somthing new everyday i guess
Yep I wnat to catch one it looks kool I was watching a video of it in youtube

They are a stocked fish.  Just contact the MNR in the area or search the net for the stocking lists.   I'll search through my pdfs to see if I can find it.  edit: here is a link the 2007-2010 stocking list for the Bancroft-Mazinaw area - http://www.ontariostewardship.org/councils/bancroft/files/Stocking_List_2007_2010_final.pdf
FishLogic beat me to it....go nuts
